name: scratch tennis
description:
what in the hell is this?

it’s literally just a simple version of pong that i made in scratch and converted to html

how do i control the thing?
player 1 is w and s

player 2 is up arrow and down arrow

github?

https://github.com/itsmeharrytv/scratch-pong

on there, i have a user-doc on how to create the game, the source code and html files, a scratch project file and a link to the scratch project.
